document.title: COLLEGE AND CAREER READY STANDARDS Indiana Academic Standards World Languages East Asian Languages 2019

1BAA538D15E847D6BF433257B747E998.description: I can reflect on how I interact with the language and culture outside of my language class.

00E6E41A34FD44F08C97F73048ABF22C.description:
Lifelong Learning - Learners set goals and reflect on their progress in using
languages for enjoyment, enrichment, and advancement.

F6850757328F47AC96BE2D60FDEFB84B.description:
I can demonstrate actions and language that indicate I know the appropriate level of
politeness and respect required for the situation.

75E88C3A01FD4005B31AAFCD6F5163CC.description:
I can collaborate and create projects and presentations with others in the target language
for their community.

B073E9C16E864FBCBAE44542086776E4.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can use the target language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact, collaborate, and contribute in my community and the globalized world.

8662876A285A42588BF24B7E5043EB4D.description:
School and Global - Learners use the language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact and collaborate in their community and the globalized world.

C627B718176245F99A486F83D93DCA1A.description:
Communicate and interact with cultural competence in order to participate in
multilingual communities at home and around the world.

E8700BA336B340B88DF9036D801DE961.description:
I can explain the differences between target and native languages in organizing
paragraphs or discourses.

97A6A3A980A14065A750495032EAC4CB.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can explain, provide details about, and give specific examples of
differences and similarities between my own language and the target language.

0BF89E80E3F644E98F0D1F40D6D274D8.description:
Language Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the nature of the language through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

708C1DB8206944078CA2A925817C3771.description:
I can explain the similarities and differences between the recycling programs
available in my community and the target culture.

5C19057F547B48D98356B2A93EECEA85.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can explain, provide details about, and give specific examples of
differences and similarities between my community and cultures of the target language.

01A49B2518F44B44B0DE7B9BF9493E6D.description:
Cultural Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

DC1795B4F58D49F0802EDD197E7838E7.description:
Develop insight into the nature of language and culture in order to interact with
cultural competence.

83A6E8978B2D4B079086541CEE10DFAF.description:
I can expand my knowledge and problem-solving skills in environmental science
by studying and analyzing recycling or other environmental topics relevant to the target
culture.

EB924F4213EB49718F6ABB0583BECD63.description:
I can read written works in the target language to expand my knowledge of East
Asian literature.

0D83BE897D424AAAB8A127A2599D453A.description:
I can build upon my history knowledge by studying and analyzing the history of
the target culture.

E51DA7A66A9040F6986501B11DF4E1BE.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can reinforce and build my critical thinking skills in other
disciplines through target language instruction.

86E465F4DEB84A0089A54847397D4330.description:
Making Connections - Learners build, reinforce, and expand their knowledge of
other disciplines while using the language to develop critical thinking and to solve problems creatively.

E83009E6278045688F5F70BEEF85C268.description:
I can comprehend and evaluate views on complex topics such as social issues,
politics, education, agriculture, and technology.

18986B2092D748BF8E1154928A39B65E.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can access and evaluate in-depth information and perspectives
that are available through the target languages and its cultures.

773131026A40493F933CE02B52A8B866.description:
Acquiring Information and Diverse Perspectives - Learners access and
evaluate information and diverse perspectives that are available through language and its cultures.

4E056473A2964D77B8F8F8689924FC39.description:
Connect with other disciplines and acquire information and diverse perspectives in
order to use the language to function in academic and career-related situations.

3B9BA8F84F6947D690559C063E36FB6F.description:
In my own and other cultures I can explain how a variety of practices within
familiar and social situations are related to perspectives.

9C13A7214ADC4B358BA3E5231BABEEDF.description:
In my own and other cultures I can explain how a variety of products of public and
personal interest are related to perspectives.

5ABB0CD9CCDC48FB951ADB73861B74B9.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - In my own words and other cultures, I can explain some diversity
among products and practices and how it relates to perspectives.

0ACE379B14F845E1A2D39131553BE78A.description:
Relating Cultural Practices and Products to Perspectives (Investigate)-
Learners use language to investigate, explain, and reflect on the relationship between the practices and
products to perspectives of the target cultures.

EE425DB9FACA47FC89F30D8EC021B94C.description:
I can demonstrate awareness of subtle differences among cultural behaviors and adjust my
behavior accordingly in familiar and some unfamiliar situations.

9C3C0905EEE9461DBFE9924BD84FD22A.description:
I can explain the major differences in thinking patterns between the target and the native
languages.

32EF4FDD0F474FD6A68FB20B0FBAF7E1.description:
I can converse comfortably with others from the target culture in familiar and some unfamiliar
situations and show some understanding of cultural differences.

411EBB003529449DA22587DE1A4DC91A.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can interact at a competent level in familiar and some unfamiliar
contexts.

CF87E8F9801B40C3B00B7466F519A4C2.description:
Relating to Other Cultures by Interacting - Learners use language to interact
with others in and from another culture.

B44F6C2D1CA54D1E8B4DAB6727C35083.description: Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

5F6A5ACBF1E34D118B29E099155E20EF.description:
I can deliver cohesive presentations on a variety of complex concrete topics
related to community interests and some specialized fields, and often deal with related issues
hypothetically.

F73C35515AE14896932F35FC03371E19.description:
I can clearly and accurately present an argument with supporting evidence on
complex concrete issues, and often deal with related issues hypothetically.

EB8E6B3617834AA586DD527FE30ACAB8.description:
I can give complex detailed narrations beyond the concrete, often addressing
abstract experiences or hypothetical issues.

8F43BBD2498348B7A37C56B9DA1315A5.description:
I can deliver detailed presentations and elaborate on a variety of concrete
academic, social and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs across major
time frames.

23B4642032934DD8B76CDE273B44D2E2.description:
I can present an argument with supporting evidence based on a variety of
concrete academic, social, and professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs
across major time frames.

0FB155F269644E8388C27503269CABA6.description:
I can tell stories based on concrete experiences in academic, social, and
professional topics of interest, using organized paragraphs across major time frames.

DA9F4853ED974E8DA70E7748BED70C2A.description:
I can deliver presentations on some concrete academic, social and professional
topics of interest, using paragraphs across major time frames.

B7A2ED140F03454D8559F1596DCE183D.description:
I can state a viewpoint with supporting evidence on some concrete academic,
social and professional topics of interest using paragraphs across major time frames.

C6C81DDC8D4E4BDAB50C856FBD1779C8.description:
I can tell stories about school and community events and personal experiences,
using paragraphs across major time frames.

C5636376637142638F2D8C50208D1A0A.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can deliver detailed and organized presentations on familiar as
well as unfamiliar concrete topics, in paragraphs and using various time frames through spoken,
written, or signed language.

214702ACEDF3466D94607111ADC8CE0F.description:
Presentational: Learners present information, concepts, and ideas to inform,
explain, persuade, and narrate on a variety of topics using appropriate media and adapting to various
audiences of listeners, readers, or viewers.

279CEC66987044318FE71FDDCD24DDD6.description:
I can follow the flow of ideas and some nuances from different viewpoints in conversations
and discussions.

CD1A6427963640649B6718B175AE6DAA.description:
I can follow the flow of ideas and some nuances from different viewpoints in most fictional
texts.

178CCAEA24684C4CB9C78269A2C6B682.description:
I can follow the flow of ideas and infer meaning from complex language on unfamiliar,
abstract topics within informational texts.

DBDE7520E02C49678B2B7C7C08974000.description:
I can understand the main message and most supporting details across major time frames
in conversations and discussions.

865F98E543CA436988B2F2E9908689D5.description:
I can follow the main story and most supporting details across major time frames in fictional
texts.

E4A257E709D946B09FD0E02115EDC64F.description:
I can understand the underlying message and most supporting details across major time
frames in descriptive informational texts.

94F19DAAAF52443C86ED830C6842B275.description:
I can understand the main message and some supporting details across major time frames
in conversations and discussions.

5FC2C843E675464F8004EAFFABC6C967.description:
I can follow the main story and some supporting detail across major time frames in fictional
texts.

799965001C9A4333B6BF82A4CAC3C53E.description:
I can identify the underlying message and some supporting details across major time frames
in descriptive informational texts.

BEBD87EAF5534F699E85FF31CB4DBB4A.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can understand the message and supporting details on a wide
variety of familiar and general interest topics across various time frames from complex, organized texts
that are spoken, written, or signed.

F28F692AC6C8489282C1920828010F18.description:
Interpretive: Learners understand, interpret, and analyze what is heard, read, or
viewed on a variety of topics.

67E608E783FF45268D442BE45B07FB61.description:
I can discuss, support, and sometimes debate opinions and advice on a variety of
complex concrete topics, often addressing hypothetical or abstract issues, and asking precise
questions.

307EED8E1FC447CAA2F0AEF95E0D0742.description:
I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication in a situation that is
generally unfamiliar.

7E7E75BC94F34D909F0E58FEFC25DD30.description:
I can discuss and debate a variety of complex concrete and some abstract academic,
social and professional topics and often deal with related issues hypothetically, using precise
questions and explanations.

C48807D61D0D4CCA97E41D1793B918D2.description:
I can maintain extended conversations by supporting, reacting to, and comparing
preferences and opinions and expressing advice and emotions in detail across major time frames,
and by asking probing questions.

342B4F50809E4E4CB33E27DFA7C8A1F4.description:
I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication that arises in a
familiar situation, providing detailed explanations and offering a variety of resolutions across major
time frames.

24B9744375804B2089CF082CACBA19C3.description:
I can maintain discussions on a wide variety of familiar and unfamiliar concrete topics of
personal and general interest, and sometimes academic, social or professional topics, by using
probing questions and providing detailed responses across major time frames.

A88D4D87669F4D4A9A3F91246E972006.description:
I can maintain conversations by providing explanations and comparisons of preferences,
opinions, and advice on familiar and concrete academic and social topics using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

737717386602408AB537C5F64CF06FEF.description:
I can interact and negotiate to resolve an unexpected complication that arises in a
familiar situation, using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

521963556CA0451B887532E6347A00B3.description:
I can exchange information and ideas in discussions on a variety of familiar and concrete
academic and social topics, using a few simple paragraphs across major time frames.

D84F97B4761B49A89A4299C821F99C19.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can understand the main message and supporting details on
a wide variety of familiar and general interest topics across various time frames from complex,
organized texts that are spoken, written, or signed.

3551D3F3EDAF4516BB55DE9370F26F4A.description:
Interpersonal: Learners interact and negotiate meaning in spoken, signed, or
written conversations to share information, reactions, feelings, and opinions.

218878BDFC23436B871C12978B25FB83.description:
Communicate effectively in more than one language in order to function in a
variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
